products.title: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary.  This elegant cream coloured elecrtric roller blind will make a wonderful additon to any room and will compliment wooden tones throughtout the home.  Electric roller blinds work perfectly for more difficult to reach windows & can provide the perfect finishing touch when dressing a window.  With a 5 year guarantee on all our products, you can rest assured that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1894 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Beige Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. 
 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout Beige roller blind. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach.

products.title: Atlantex Dark Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Atlantex Dark Beige Electric Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Warm, rich and deep colours to suit those cold winters evenings whilst helping to retain heat. 
 
This dark beige roller blind is perfect to create a warm and cosy feel in any room in your home. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach.

products.title: Luxari PVC Blackout Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Luxari PVC Blackout Beige Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £153.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Luxari PVC Blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat. 
 
This beige roller blind is made from a PVC fabric so is therefore waterproof and flame retardant - perfect for kitchens and bathrooms!
